alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 12:43PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Elko County through 115 PM PDT... At 1242 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 13 miles south of Oasis, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oasis and Silver Zone Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
